The given code chunk is part of an `AsyncRequest` class initialization. It sets up essential instance variables such as tracking the request object, initializing timeout-related variables, and preparing data structures for managing asynchronous requests.

AsyncRequest._asyncRequests[id(self)] = self
        self.deletingMessage = "AsyncRequest-deleting-%s"%(id(self,))
        self.air = air
        self.replyToChannelId = replyToChannelId
        self.timeoutTask = None
        self.neededObjects = {}
        self._timeoutTime = timeoutTime
        self._initialNumRetries = numRetries
